metaTitle: Our Christmas Toy Product Range | The Christmas Elf
metaContent: Check out the full product range from Christmas Elf. We offer the ideal Christmas gifts, from Christmas Elf Sets to Christmas Elf Bags.

products.title: Christmas Elf Set
products.description: Your choice of a girl elf, a boy elf wearing shorts or a boy elf wearing a tunic.
productInfo: 1 elf(boy or girl) - you have the choice of a boy with shorts or with a tunic (please use drop down box to indicate your choice)
1 personalised letter from Father Christmas to explain to your child the purpose of the Elf's visit.

products.title: Santa's Lost Button
products.description: Image your child's face when they find Santa's lost button on Christmas morning.
